title: Covid-19 Cases Soar to New Records in U.S.
content:
1. Covid-19 Cases Soar to New Records in U.S.  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Covid cases rise by 948% in Florida as Omicron drives huge wave across US  The Guardian
  3. Omicron surge: Florida moves up on Top 10 list of states where COVID-19 is spreading the fastest  The Florida Times-Union
  4. Florida COVID update: State breaks another case record, and hospitalizations on the rise  Miami Herald
  5. COVID-19 hospitalizations increase ‘rapidly’ in Polk County amid fourth wave  WFLA
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
